Attributes.description: Aseptic handling and characterization of microbes, growth properties, enzyme assays, protein analysis and plasmid isolation. Restricted to students in Microbiology and Immunology specializations.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: All of BIOL 200, BIOL 201, CHEM 233 and one of MICB 211, MICB 201 and one of MICB 212, MICB 202.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 1, Days: Thu, Start Time: 13:00, End Time: 17:00, Building: Biological, Room: Sciences
